tool_description: An live  Football stands api that allows users to see Match standings like corners, shots ect.  All data ist up to time, so live!
name: LIVE FOOTBALL STANDS
title: LIVE FOOTBALL STANDS

api_list.name: Get all live football standings
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all live football standings in real time.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-football-stands.p.rapidapi.com/live"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-football-stands.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

api_list.name: Get Individual live football standings
api_list.description: Gets standings about a specific live football match. The ID's are given by the response of /live. By adding /live/+ID.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-football-stands.p.rapidapi.com/live/ecuador-brasilien-2022-01-27"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-football-stands.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-football-stands.p.rapidapi.com/live/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-football-stands.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
